notesStmt.note: Prints and replies to John Burges's apology to William Chadderton.
With a final errata leaf. Variant 1: this leaf contains a short address, "Courteous reader ..".
Variant 2: title page has "by Iohn Burges".
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
